ovdesc.p: This is a single window initiation screen to choose the type of Treasury transaction. It simplifies the transaction input for the User, as he need not go through the entire menu for selecting the operation but just choosing the appropriate values from the drop down available against each field. Upon committing this record,the User will be taken to the respective version with the relevant values defaulted.

desc.p: The field "Transaction" holds dropdown values as: Derivatives (Own Book), Forex, FRA Deals, Money Market, ND Deal, Precious Metal, Repo Transaction, Securities (Own Book), Swap Deals
The field "Contract Type" displays dropdown values depending upon the value chosen in the field "Transaction".
This field displays Customer Number which can be inputted by the user or chosen from the dropdown enquiry.
The field "OwnBook Portfolio" displays the list of Ownbook Portfolio's which can be chosen by the user from the dropdown enquiry.
